subject: Re: Final Payment Release
body:
U.S. Department of State
Department of Finance and Administration
2201 C Street NW
Washington, DC 20520
Email: Dereck@treasurydeptgov.us

Attn: Sir

Thanks for your responses. However, acting in our capacity as the apex 
body authorized by the US Government to reconcile foreign payments, I 
write to officially inform you that we have given instruction to the 
Federal Reserve Bank to release your fund valued at US$10,500,000.00 
(Ten Million Five Hundred Thousand US Dollars) from the US Treasury 
Account with them to any designated Bank Account of your choice. Hence, 
I am contacting you via our official Government approved e-mail address 
for your verification and also to erase any doubt on whom you are 
dealing with.

Therefore, the completion of this transaction depends on your ability to 
comply with the process of the Federal Reserve Bank. I can assure you 
that this is legal payment process as I can never be involved in 
anything illegal. Note: that your payment has been approved for 
immediate release and transfer into your bank account as the sole 
beneficiary with irrevocable Payment Router #: FRB-XXCL-753-082-10 
issued and signed by the Chief Financial Officer.

I wait for the reconfirmation of your bank details.

I look forward to your quick response.

Yours truly,

Mr. Dereck J. Hogan.
Commissioner, Centralized Accounting.

subject: Re: Final Payment Release
body:
Hello Mr. Dereck J. Hogan,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. It's quite a surprise to hear about such a large sum of money! I'm curious, how did my name come up in relation to this fund? 

Also, could you please explain more about the process that the Federal Reserve Bank will follow? I'd like to understand it better before proceeding.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Final Payment Release
body:
U.S. Department of State
Department of Finance and Administration
2201 C Street NW
Washington, DC 20520
Email: Dereck@treasurydeptgov.us

Attn: Sir

Following the receipt of your email communication, I write to officially 
inform you that we have instructed The Federal Reserve Bank to release 
your funds valued US$10,500,000.00 (Ten Million Five Hundred Thousand US 
Dollars) from the US Treasury Account with them to any designated Bank 
Account of your choice.

However, in accordance with the payment procedure of The Federal Reserve 
Bank, you are expected to fill out the enclosed "REMITTANCE FORM C1" as 
attached with this message for the successful completion of your fund 
transfer.

I look forward to your quick response.

Yours truly,

Mr. Dereck J. Hogan.
Commissioner, Centralized Accounting.

subject: Re: Final Payment Release
body:
Hello Mr. Dereck J. Hogan,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite a surprise to hear about this fund transfer! Could you please provide more details about it? How did this come about? 

Also, I noticed that there is no REMITTANCE FORM attached with your message as mentioned. Could you kindly resend it?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Final Payment Release
body:
Hello Mr. Dereck J. Hogan,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite a surprise to hear about this fund transfer! Could you please provide more details about how this came to be? I don't recall having any pending transactions or investments that would result in such a large sum.

Also, could you explain more about the REMITTANCE FORM? What kind of information does it require? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Final Payment Release
body:
U.S. Department of State
Department of Finance and Administration
2201 C Street NW
Washington, DC 20520
Email: Dereck@treasurydeptgov.us

Attn: Sir

Following the receipt of your email communication, you need to fill the 
REMITTANCE FORM with your personal and bank details for successful 
completion of your fund transfer. Once you fill the REMITTANCE FORM, 
return it back to us via mail attachment. The US$10,500,000.00 (Ten 
Million Five Hundred Thousand US Dollars) is a Government approved fund 
from the U.S. Department of State to clear all the outstanding 
inheritance/contract delayed payment. Hence, as the sole beneficiary, 
you are required to provide the needed information for the transfer.

I look forward to your quick response.

Yours truly,

Mr. Dereck J. Hogan.
Commissioner, Centralized Accounting.

subject: Re: Final Payment Release
body:
Hello Mr. Dereck J. Hogan,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite exciting to hear about this government-approved fund from the Department of State.

However, I'm a bit confused about the REMITTANCE FORM you mentioned. Could you please explain more about it? What kind of information does it require?

Also, could you provide more details about this contract delayed payment? I'm not sure I fully understand what that means.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Final Payment Release
body:
Hello Mr. Dereck J. Hogan,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite a surprise to hear about this large sum of money! I'm curious, how did this come about? 

Also, could you please explain more about the REMITTANCE FORM? What kind of information does it require?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Final Payment Release
body:
Hello Mr. Dereck J. Hogan,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing such detailed information about this matter. It's quite a surprise to hear about this fund valued at US Ten Million Five Hundred Thousand US Dollars. I must admit, it's not every day that one receives such news.

Could you please elaborate more on the process of the Federal Reserve Bank? I'm not very familiar with these financial matters, so any additional information would be greatly appreciated.

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "Payment Router"? Is this some sort of document or procedure?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
William
